[WhenUse] Gain 1 [Endurance] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Lenticular Rend
text.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Laceration] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Endurance] next turn (once per turn)

text.name: Rules of the Backstreets
text.desc: [WhenUse] If this unit has [CloudWall], unconditionally activate all Reuse effects on this Skill's Coins
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit has [BlackCloudBlade], Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)
[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit has [EngageToBattle], Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)

text.desc:

If Kurokumo Clan Captain Ishmael is on the field, activate the following:
- Convert all Coins in this Skill into [SuperCoin]s
- Final Power +3 to this Skill upon Clash Lose
[WhenUse] If this unit has [CloudWall], unconditionally activate all Reuse effects on this Skill's Coins

[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit has [EngageToBattle], Reuse Coin once (once per Skill)

- Convert all Coins in this Skill into [SuperCoin]s

Deal +10% damage for every type of negative effect on target (max 100%)

1071201.name: Dark Cloud Blade
1071201.desc:
When there are 2+ allied Kurokumo Clan Identities on the field, including this unit, gain 1 [BlackCloudBlade] (max 1)

Against enemies that, in this turn, used Defense Skills or were at max HP before attacking: deal +10% damage

If an enemy attacked an other ally with a Skill and dealt damage this turn: use an Unopposed Attack against the attacker with Skill 1 (once per turn)

1071202.name: Battle Ready
1071202.desc:
When a Kurokumo Clan ally dies, gain 1 [SlashResultUp] for this Encounter

When 3 or more Kurokumo Clan allies are defeated, gain [EngageToBattle] for this Encounter

1071211.name: Dark Cloud Blade
1071211.desc:
When there are 2+ allied Kurokumo Clan Identities on the field, including this unit, gain 1 [BlackCloudBlade] (max 1)

Against enemies that, in this turn, used Defense Skills or were at max HP before attacking: deal +10% damage

If an enemy attacked an other ally with a Skill and dealt damage this turn: use an Unopposed Attack against the attacker with Skill 1 (once per turn)

If the enemy killed an other ally, or if the said ally's HP is at less than 25% after the enemy's attack, use an Unopposed Attack against the attacker with <Rules of the Backstreets> instead (once per ally; 2 times per turn; the Skill activated with this effect counts as an Attack Skill)

1071221.name: Impale
1071221.desc: 1 ally with the fastest Speed: against enemies that used Defense Skills or were at max HP before attacking this turn: deal +10% damage

notes.short: At 2+ Kurokumo identities on the field or 3+ Kurokumo allies dead, gains {keyword:Slash} and {keyword:Laceration} application buffs. Both conditions add 1 Reuse Coin each to his clashable counter. S3 gives a buff that forces both Reuse Coins to trigger on the counter. When passive is active, attacks enemies that attack allies with S1 (once per turn). If the ally drops below 25% HP or dies, use his counter instead (twice per turn).
notes.full:
If there are 2 or more Kurokumo identities on the field (including himself so he only needs 1 more), he gains {status:BlackCloudBlade} giving him {status:SlashResultUp} and bonus {status:Laceration} application. Each Kurokumo ally that dies gives him a {status:SlashResultUp} for the rest of the fight. If 3 or more Kurokumo allies have died, he gains {status:EngageToBattle} which gives him even more {status:SlashResultUp}, some {status:SlashDamageUp} and more bonus {status:Laceration} application. Both {status:BlackCloudBlade} and {status:EngageToBattle} each give his Counter a Coin Reuse, bringing it from 1 Coin to 3 Coins instead. Using his S3 gives him {status:CloudWall} for a turn which forces his Counter to trigger both Coin Reuses regardless of whether he has the other two buffs. It's consumed on use, so it won't work for a 2nd counter in the same turn. All his attack skills also give him {status:Endurance} for a turn making his counter even stronger. If {identity:10811} is on the field, the counter gets {status:SuperCoin} and +4 Final Power on Clash Lose.

If his passive is active (3 {keyword:Lust} Res.), he attacks enemies that attacks his allies. If the ally drops below 25% HP or dies, he uses his counter (once per ally, up to 2 times per turn). This version of the counter doesn't count as a defense skill so it doesn't benefit from {status:Endurance}, but it can still benefit from {status:CloudWall}. If the ally stays above 25% HP, he uses his S1 instead (once per turn).
